meta.title: The First Ten Numbers & Basic Radicals

principles.I: Interaction - Transitive verbs, components act ON each other
principles.N: Negative valence - Destruction, shock, visceral imagery

tone_system.1: SINGING - sustained high note, opera singer
tone_system.2: SURPRISED - gasp, startle, rising energy (NOT questioning)
tone_system.3: ZOMBIE - low groan, creaky voice, undead rumble (NOT dipping)
tone_system.4: COMMANDING - sharp bark, karate chop, decisive

characters.pithy_formula: I trace ONE line and SING 'YEEE!' - it rings forever.
characters.story: I trace a single line across the sky with my finger and SING 'YEEE!' - the note holds, unbroken, ONE perfect sound ringing across the heavens.

characters.pithy_formula: I stack TWO logs and BARK 'ARR!' - they crash into place.
characters.story: I SLAM two logs on top of each other, BARKING 'ARR!' as they crash into place. TWO heavy beams, stacked with force - my sharp command echoes.

characters.pithy_formula: I climb THREE steps, SINGING 'SAAAHN!' - sunshine floods in.
characters.story: I climb THREE gleaming steps toward the sun, SINGING 'SAAAHN!' in a sustained high note. The warm light floods my face as my voice holds steady.

characters.pithy_formula: I SLAM four items into a box, COMMANDING 'SEE!'
characters.story: I SHOVE four screaming items into a box, COMMANDING 'SEE!' with a sharp chop. FOUR corners trap them - my hand slams the lid shut.

similar_warning.repulsion: 四 traps things INSIDE; 西 has a horizontal line THROUGH it like the setting sun

characters.pithy_formula: FIVE rotting fingers claw from the grave, GROANING 'Wuuuu...'
characters.story: FIVE rotting fingers burst through the dirt - I watch in horror as the zombie hand GROANS 'Wuuuu...' from deep in its creaky throat. Low, rumbling, undead.

characters.pithy_formula: Leo the lion ROARS 'LEE-OH!' - SIX sharp barks shake the ground.
characters.story: Leo the lion ROARS 'LEE-OH!' with six thundering barks. His mane (the lid) shakes as each COMMAND crashes down - SIX explosive sounds.

characters.pithy_formula: I slash SEVEN sparklers through the dark, SINGING 'CHEE!'
characters.story: I SLASH seven sparklers across the night sky, SINGING 'CHEE! CHEE! CHEE!' - the sustained high squeals ring out. SEVEN bright lines, my voice holding each note.

characters.pithy_formula: I RIP the path in two - EIGHT sheep SING 'BAAAH!' as it splits.
characters.story: I RIP the path apart with my bare hands - it SPLITS into two directions. EIGHT sheep pour through, SINGING 'BAAAH!' in a sustained bleating chorus.

similar_warning.repulsion: 八 strokes SEPARATE outward (sheep fleeing); 入 strokes CONVERGE inward (entering)

characters.pithy_formula: NINE hooks drag me down - the zombie GROANS 'Jiuuu...' in creaky agony.
characters.story: NINE rusty hooks snag my flesh, dragging me toward the pit. A zombie GROANS 'Jiuuu...' - that low, creaky moan echoing from the depths. Nine hooks, nine wounds.

similar_warning.repulsion: 九 has an OPEN hook (empty, grasping); 丸 has a dot INSIDE (pill enclosed)

characters.pithy_formula: I dig up the X and GASP 'SHIH?!' - TEN gold coins explode out!
characters.story: I dig at the cross marking treasure and GASP 'SHIH?!' in shock - TEN gold coins EXPLODE from the ground! My voice rises in pure surprise at the bounty.

characters.pithy_formula: My square MOUTH unhinges and GROANS 'Kohhh...' - zombie hunger.
characters.story: My jaw unhinges into a perfect square - my zombie MOUTH GROANS 'Kohhh...' from deep in my rotting throat. Low, creaky, hungry for flesh.

similar_warning.repulsion: 口 is SMALL (just a mouth); 囗 is LARGE (enclosing a whole city)

characters.pithy_formula: The SUN blasts my eyes open, COMMANDING 'REE!' - ONE burning bar.
characters.story: The SUN BLASTS through my window and COMMANDS 'REE!' - I'm ripped from sleep. ONE blazing bar of light inside the box. A new DAY begins whether I like it or not.

similar_warning.repulsion: 日 has ONE line inside (single sun); 目 has TWO lines (two eyelids blinking)

characters.pithy_formula: The crescent MOON COMMANDS 'YUE!' - I flip another calendar page.
characters.story: The crescent MOON hangs above and COMMANDS 'YUE!' with sharp authority. I RIP another calendar page off the wall - another MONTH gone. The moon's order is final.

similar_warning.moon_vs_flesh_note: When 月 appears on the LEFT side of a character, it usually means FLESH/BODY (evolved from 肉). Only when standalone or on the RIGHT does it mean moon/time.

characters.pithy_formula: I step into the FIELD and GASP 'TYEN?!' - mud swallows my legs!
characters.story: I step into the rice FIELD and GASP 'TYEN?!' in shock - the mud SWALLOWS my legs up to the knees! Four square plots, and I'm sinking fast. Pure surprise.

similar_warning.repulsion: 田 is fully ENCLOSED (trapped in the field); 由 ESCAPES below (has a reason to leave)

characters.pithy_formula: Dust STABS my EYE - I BARK 'MOO!' TWO eyelids slamming shut.
characters.story: A speck of dust STABS into my EYE - I BARK 'MOO!' in sharp pain. TWO eyelids slam shut, tears streaming. The eye COMMANDS the invader out.

similar_warning.repulsion: 目 has TWO lines (two eyelids); 日 has ONE line (single sun bar)

lesson_palace.description: A dusty vault where numbers come alive - each station holds its treasure

character_stations.一: The entrance: a single plank across the threshold
character_stations.二: Log pile: two beams stacked by the door
character_stations.三: Staircase: three steps leading up to the light
character_stations.五: Crypt corner: five-fingered hand clawing up
character_stations.六: Lion statue: Leo guards six coins
character_stations.七: Chandelier: seven sparklers hanging from ceiling
character_stations.八: Forked passage: eight sheep scatter two ways
character_stations.九: Hook rack: nine rusty hooks on the wall
character_stations.十: X marks the spot: ten gold coins buried below
character_stations.口: Speaking grate: square mouth in the floor
character_stations.日: East window: morning sun blasting through
character_stations.月: Calendar wall: crescent moon marking months
character_stations.田: Courtyard: rice field visible through the bars
